event.summary: 11/7/1995: Unknown perpetrators tossed an incendiary onto the roof of the Family Planning Associates clinic in Ventura, California, United States. There were no casualties, but the building sustained $500 in damages.
event.motive: To protest the practice of abortion and to sabotage abortion facilities operating in California.
event.weapdetail: Flare bundled with what is believed to be a quick start fire log thrown onto the roof of the building.
event.addnotes: Fifteen months after this incident, there was an attack at the same abortion clinic (199502090009). The Family Planning Associates clinic was the target of many demonstrations.
event.scite1: Julie Fields, "Ventura: Medical Center Roof Fire Investigated," Los Angeles Times, November 9, 1993.
event.scite2: Julie Fields, "2nd Arson Fire at Ventura Clinic Probed," Los Angeles Times, February 10, 1995.
event.scite3: "Across the USA: News From Every State," USA Today, November 9, 1993.
